page.title: 02Schools in Wombourne
page.content:
All the schools are organised by the Staffordshire Education Committee. There are eight schools in this area in 1985, a mixture of primary,first,middle and high schools. The leaving ages of the children are given in brackets.
1.Cherry Trees Special School 2.St.Bernadette's Roman Catholic School (11) 3.St.Benedict Biscop C.of.E School (9) 4.Westfield First School (9) 5.Blakeley Heath First School (9) 6.Westfield Middle School(13) 7.Blakeley Heath Middle School(13) 8.Ounsdale High School(16 to 18).
In A.D.1987 schools 3,4,5,6,7&8 will be closed and four new schools will open. St.Benedict Biscop Primary School (11) Westfield Primary School(11).Blakeley Heath Primary School(11) and Ounsdale High(16 to 18)
